service.title: The Canonical Link Relation
service.documentation: RFC 5988 specifies a way to define relationships between links on the web. This document describes a new type of such a relationship, "canonical", to designate an Internationalized Resource Identifier (IRI) as preferred over resources with duplicative content.

link-relation.documentation: The target (canonical) IRI MUST identify content that is either duplicative or a superset of the content at the context (referring) IRI.
